name: Stitch em' up
description:
Playtime is over...

-An Exciting new fighting game-

Engage in an exciting new combat sport, attack your opponent to rip the fabric off their body, whoever fills up their fabric wins!
Use a variety of punches, blocks, throws and your movement to outsmart your opponent and dominate!

Use either a Playstation or Xbox controller.

-Play as two funny little characters-

Claus the Clown: A funny little clown fella with an arsenal of tricks up his sleeve, watch out for his pin.
Ann: A rough tough fighter, she rips herself apart for an incredible grab.

Each character has unique strengths and weaknesses, use them to be victorious!

-Credits-

  • Project Manager: Serena Green
  • Programmer: Jack Isle
  • Character Artists: Lulu Pauling/Oliwia Flourczyk
  • Designers: Rhys Whittington/Serena Green
  • Sound Design: Rhys Whittington
  • Environment Artist: Ryan Burton
  • Sound Effects: Ultimate Sound FX Bundle by Sidearm Studios

This game was developed in 4 days under the UoN Game Jam.
